mapper.select: SELECT su.* FROM course LEFT JOIN course_user cu ON cu.course_id = course.id AND cu.user_type = 3 LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON su.id = cu.user_id WHERE course.id = #{courseId}
SELECT su.* FROM course LEFT JOIN course_user cu ON cu.course_id = course.id AND ( cu.user_type = 1 OR cu.user_type = 2 ) LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON su.id = cu.user_id WHERE course.id = #{courseId}
SELECT su.username, su.avatar, su.account, nu.create_time FROM notice_user nu LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON su.id = nu.user_id WHERE nu.notice_id = #{noticeId} AND nu.is_deleted = 0
